user.title: Twilio Account
user.description:
Enter your Twilio Account SID and Auth Token.

Find your credentials at:
- [US Console](https://console.twilio.com/us1/account/keys-credentials/api-keys)
- [Australia Console](https://console.twilio.com/au1/account/keys-credentials/api-keys)
- [Ireland Console](https://console.twilio.com/ie1/account/keys-credentials/api-keys)
- [General Console](https://console.twilio.com)

select_numbers.title: Select Phone Numbers
select_numbers.description:
Select the Twilio phone numbers you want to use for sending SMS.

External URL is required for MMS with local files (e.g., camera snapshots). Enter your Home Assistant external URL including http:// or https://
